name: nuts for nuts
description:
Roguelike created within one week for 7DRL Challenge 2022.

You are a tailless but winged squirrel trying to survive the winter.

You have to fight for your food, whereas each kind of food has its specific nutritional value.

Move with WASD or Arrow Keys Shoot with LMB

I did everything myself except: 

nature sound recording  were downloaded from freesound.org 

font by Brian J. Bonislawsky DBA Astigmatic downloaded from Google Fonts
